general_advisory: Due to low temperature, apply thin layer of dry FYM on nursery to maintain the temperature. Start sowing the summer crops when the temperature is conducive for germination.

advisory: At 3 weeks of paddy, top dress with 16 kg Nitrogen per acre.
Paddy needs everyday 1 cm water for its optimum growth.
SRI Paddy: Transplant the 10-12 days old seedling on the main field.
National pulses with high yield in dry season are: - Mung varieties IPM-02-14, IPM-02-3, PDM-11, PDM-54, Durga, Samrat, K-851, and Blackgram varieties. Collect and sow 25 kg of seeds per hectare.
Before sowing treat the seeds with Carbendazim @ 2 g/kg of seeds.
When the maize crop is 2-3 weeks old, go for intercultivation and apply 8 kg Nitrogen per acre.
If gypsum is not applied at sowing, apply it in lines @ 50kg/acre or broadcast 100 kg Gypsum per acre.
Irrigate the crop at crown root initiation and jointing stage.
In the early-sown crop, apply 8 kg Nitrogen per acre.
In case of Stem borer, apply Triazophos @ 2 ml/liter of water.
When the seedlings are 3 weeks old, transplant at spacing of 20 X 10 cm.
If the soil is not tested, apply 24:16:12 kg NPK/acre.
At 25 to 30 days after sowing, apply 6-8 kg nitrogen per acre.
Complete sowing of summer sunflower in irrigated areas.
Choose good varieties like MSFH 17, KBSH1, Jwalamukhi @ 2 kg seed per acre.
In the delayed sown crop, apply the remaining fertilizer of Nitrogen 30 kg/acre.
Manage the Leaf blight of potato by application of Mancozeb @ 1 g per litre of water.
Manage the Brinjal Foot & Shoot borer by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
The shed should be well ventilated.
Put sand on the floor of the shed to absorb excreta.
In winter, feed cattle with high-energy fiber foods.
Balance the coldness of water by applying lime@ 100kg per 1 meter depth of water.
Give lower quantity of food to ease the digestion capacity of fish.
Add half a gram of furasil to 1 liter of water for 3 days.
To control chicken rabies, administer Lasota vaccine within the first 7 days.
